title: Plain Paste.
ingredients: 44 134 cup cups lard. flour. Cold water. ¼ 4g cup teaspoon butter. salt.
instructions: Wash butter, pat, and form in circular piece. Add salt
make three layers, turn half-way round, pat, and roll out;
Mix salt with flour, cut in shortening with knife. Moisten
Mix salt with flour, Reserve one and one-fourth table-
